title: Yikes on a Cracker!
description: Growing up, Hayden Corby was my best friend, and my worst enemy. It was always that way, but we could never stay away from each other. When he moved away, my world changed and the trouble stopped. The fun stopped too.I convinced myself it was a good thing.I convinced myself I didn’t need him.But now it's five years later and our parents' are taking us to the lake house for the 4th of July.It's only a couple of days in his presence, but it’s been so long that I'm dreading it.God only knows who that guy is at eighteen. He’s probably an arrogant jock, who wants nothing to do with the bookish me.So, imagine my shock when it turns out that Hayden not only glowed right up, but he makes my heart beat funny too.Maybe there'll be more than the fireworks going bang this year...Yikes on a Cracker is short and steamy romance that was previously known as Hayden's Firecracker. As always, this Megan Wade book comes with her ‘Sugar Promise’. High heat, low drama, guaranteed
author: Megan Wade
